item.title: EP 56 - The Mellified Man: The World's Yummiest Mummy
item.itunes:title: The Mellified Man: The World's Yummiest Mummy
item.description:
Today we take a taste . . . I mean take a look at the mellified man aka the mummy made of honey!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Links:

Mellified Man

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mellified_man

Traditional Chinese Medicines Derived From The Human Body

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_medicines_derived_from_the_human_body

Mellified man- or human mummy confection was an ancient medicinal substance created by steeping a human cadaver in honey

https://www.thevintagenews.com/2016/09/15/mellified-man-human-mummy-confection-ancient-medicinal-substance-created-steeping-human-cadaver-honey/

How to make honey infused corpse medicine

https://strangeremains.com/2015/11/29/how-to-make-honey-infused-corpse-medicine/

Honey, I’m Dead

https://www.nationalgeographic.org/projects/out-of-eden-walk/articles/2015-05-honey-im-dead/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
